ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] need help to keep "Latrodectus Mactans" alive
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i already got contacted by some people (thank you very much), but i would like to add a few lines for those who are interested in helping me: 1) i live in
ygData.messageBody:
On 22 Oct 2002 at 8:23, Biltilie Dwimmerlaik wrote:

> it took me quite some time, after asking Su, that i would like to
> post this email asking for help, to make my guild survive.
> [...]
> to contact me, you have two options: in game (tell Biltilie, Delaney,
> Urva, Udaena, Ldara, Zimboka, or Nadja) or write me an email
> mailto:biltilie@...

i already got contacted by some people (thank you very much), but i
would like to add a few lines for those who are interested in helping
me:

1) i live in germany, so my timezone is CEST (currently GMT+2). i
think the difference to PST is 8 hours. so 8am PST is 4pm CEST.
but i might be wrong by one hour, i always mess up with the time :-)

2) during the week i play from 7pm CEST to 10pm CEST, if i am on at
all.

3) weekends are much better to meet: (most of the time) i am on from
8am CEST to 10pm CEST with just some small breaks.

4) of course i can help with some money to start with, help with some levels, or get the necessary items for quest levelling
(only non-evil races).

5) i someone needs something like this on another server, i can
support you with four accounts ... ;-)

6) "we" could also etablish "Latrodectus Mactans" on other servers.
i have to admit, i really love this guild name ... :-)


again, thanks to all the people who want to help me (or us).
and there is still more room for some more.


- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, level 56 female gnome magician
Urva Ceindrech, level 51 female dark-elf wizard
Delaney Arianwen, level 51 female high-elf cleric
Latrodectus Mactans - Tarew Marr
